alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Dorchester; Hampton; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:16AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...AREAS OF FOG THIS MORNING... Areas of fog will continue to develop across interior Southeast South Carolina and Southeast Georgia. The fog could become locally dense at time with visibilities dropping to 1/4 mile or less. The nature of the fog is such that visibilities will vary greatly over short distances with the risk for locally dense fog being the greatest near bodies of water and other low-lying areas such as rivers, marshes, swamps and large ditches. Motorists should remain alert for these conditions this morning. Some locations that could see locally dense fog include Metter, Millen, Claxton, Statesboro, Sylvania, Allendale, Hampton, Walterboro, Harleyville and Moncks Corner.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down and leave extra distance ahead of you in case a sudden stop is needed.

area.areaDesc: Allendale; Dorchester; Hampton; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton
